author: Sporting News
title: WATCH: The most fantastic point of AO comes in final | Tennis | Sporting News
text:
January 29, 2017 6:25am EST January 29, 2017 6:25am EST This was just incredible. Sporting News 
Published on Jan. 29, 2017 
Jan. 29, 2017 
Roger Federer and Rafael Nadal were always going to put on a show during the final of the Australian Open at Melbourne Park on Sunday night. 
MORE: Super Serena setting new standard for longevity 
But to say this point was absolutely, ridiculously, insanely good, would be an understatement. 
The fourth set point had absolutely everything, and finished with one of the craziest winners youâ€™re likely to see from Rafa. 
Even Roger had to applaud this one. 
Take a look at the craziness unfold in the video player above.
